section.title: daos_acl Struct Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: Header for the Access Control List, followed by the table of variable-length Access Control Entries. The entry list may be walked by inspecting the principal length and calculating the entry's overall length from that.
Definition at line 62 of file daos_security.h.
